original_text: He took away the treasures of the house of the Lord and the treasures of the king's house. He took away everything. He also took away all the shields of gold that Solomon had made,
korean_text: 여호와의 성전의 보물과 왕궁의 보물을 모두 빼앗고 또 솔로몬이 만든 금 방패를 다 빼앗은지라

sentences.original_text: He took away the treasures of the house of the Lord
and the treasures of the king's house.
He also took away all the shields of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 모든 금 방패들을 가져갔습니다
